I liked the idea of the game and the concept of it. Sadly there are so many bugs in this game when it comes to bloodpoints. I actually stopped playing because i couldnt recieve them anymore. Not just for a week or two but for months. Im sick and tired of how buggy this game is. But if you overlook that aspect its actuall pretty fun. And its a bit like real life when you think about it xD if you are a loner you play killer cuz u mad. otherwise u survive with friends. those killers are just jealous lmao xD but no for real its fun when you play it with friends but alone, as a survivor.. nah thats kinda boring.

i love this game so much, DBD (dead by daylight) is my life. it's all i do and it is all that matters to me. every thought i put into being a competitive survivor is preemptive. my parents ask me why i don't play any sports and it made me RAGE so hard because DBD is a sport. all the thinking i put into unique pathing requires the highest degree of intellect. in my eyes and my swf, i am world DBD champion on PC. even my e-girlfriend thinks so. well we are not official yet but we have played a few times, and i can tell she thinks im alpha when i save her from the hook, or die by trying to unhook her from a facecamping leatherface.
Gra jest przednia ale aktualizacje są zbyt często u dużo ważą

Игра на самом деле интересная и сильно затягивает начинающих игроков, как я. Эта игра больше на работу в команде, чем хоррор. Большой выбор персонажей, маньяков и перков очень радует, но есть минус - чтобы все освоить необходимо большое кол-во часов, хотя для многих, как и я, это скорее плюс, чем минус. Рекомендую купить дополнения, так как они значительно улучшат и разнообразят игру)
great game with 0 problems and 0 bugs uwu
Tiene una muy buena mecanica de asesino y sobreviviente muy divertido jugar con tus amigos y ser sobrevivientes y muy interesantes ser asesino

Веселая игра. Если бы еще изменили систему банов для багоюзеров. А так же  пофиксили бы ошибки игры из-за которой вылетаешь и даётся бан.

This game does have a nice and fun concept... but the people behind it are utterly incompetent. This is supposed to be a game with simple and bland game play, but competitive! And the competitive part is not taken care of at all. 
     When one game you're being paired with a "killer" who tunnels you (ignores the game entirely to try to kill you) for 5 generators, exit gate AND you still escape BUT the next game 2 "survivors" get "taken out" after less than one minute into the game starting. "Skill" based matchmaking.
     It is sad because instead of being taken seriously; this game is just a cash cow.

рецепт блинчиков на молоке :

1) молоко 500 мл
2) яйца 3 шт.
3) мука 200 г
4) масло сливочное (или растительное) 30 г (2 ст. ложки)
5) сахар 30 г (2 ст. ложки)
6) соль 2-3 г (1/2 ч. ложки)

so kinda moved from xbox to pc recently so roughly 100 hrs combined do note your shit aint transferring yet so if you don't want to do what i did and re-buy just wait. 
Anyway ignore the thumbs up cuz its more sideways game is fun ngl issue comes in when you realize devs are lazy they put in mmr that they dont even know whats going on with it they nerf things that dont need nerfs and dont buff things that need buffs mmr makes it worse cuz eventually you be going against nothing but the same perks and same killers.

my tip if you gonna get it dont get too invested and learn early on to not care about winning or losing oh btw no license is perma

Игра достойна того чтобы находится, в топе, максимально ламповость и пот, играть можно как и в одного так и с друзьями это огромный плюс, за выживших в соло спокойно можно доходить до красного ранга, ещё одна крутая игра где важен скил, ум и дальновидность, поиграв 100 часов за последний месяц я научился каким-то новым механикам, которые упрощают игру, так уж игра достойная

é sobre isso e está tudo bem

don't even bother playing killer, its pointless. this game was good until people started using discord calls. the majority of my hours are from when the game first dropped. it was great to play as killer and genuinely fun. however people started ganging up and using discord calls. to make it even worse, survivors like to go and cry to the devs that the game "isn't fair enough for them". meanwhile 4 people in a discord call that are even remotely competent make this game impossible as killer. whats even worse is the community. they get super mad when you "tunnel"and play "toxic". meanwhile they're constantly screwing you over and trolling you at the exit after they open it. sure people are gonna say oh get good. these are either neck beards who only play this game or people who play strictly survivor and are the reason why I hate this game. if you wanna play killer there's no point and unfortunately for me thats what i like to play. my recommendation for the devs is to make this game way more difficult for the survivors. i mean if you didn't add voice chat or even in game chat to begin with it's obviously meant to be played without it. half the survivors are teams of people on discord calls. you need to make the killer faster or make the survivors slower. its extremely unfair as killer and it makes the game not even interesting as you alienate an entire group of people who want to play as killer.
The new ranking system has completely ruined the game. It takes no skill to rank up so you are constantly paired with high rank people who have zero skill in playing the game.
